svg.g: <rect x='.5' y='.5' width='29' height='39' fill='black' stroke='red'/> <g transform='translate(0, 5)'> <circle cx='15' cy='15' r='10' fill='yellow'/> <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='1.5' fill='black'/> <circle cx='17' cy='12' r='1.5' fill='black'/> <path d='M 10 19 A 8 8 0 0 0 20 19' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/> </g>
